authors: Consultative Group for International Agricultural Research
citation.title: CGIAR in Ethiopia

blogs.title: In Ethiopia, collaboration by CGIAR and national partners is delivering integrated development solutions
blogs.summary: Agriculture accounts for an average of 47% of Ethiopia’s GDP over the last decade. It employs approximately 75% of the labour force, and smallholder farmers cultivate 94% of arable land in the country. With population growing by nearly 3% per annum,

news.title: In Ethiopia, collaboration by CGIAR and national partners is delivering integrated development solutions
news.summary: Agriculture accounts for an average of 47% of Ethiopia’s GDP over the last decade.
